typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesCSV
Aggregate2 aggregate() ~> Aggregate1
MoviesCSV aggregate() ~> Aggregate2
